fragile_ecosystem.title: [SUCCESS] Link abducted
fragile_ecosystem.body:
Link generated & abducted to clipboard.
Length: 35 chars of pure spaghetti code.
Capability: Desktop works (miraculously). Mobile is view-only because my CSS is a fragile ecosystem.

honest_dev.title: [OK] Link ready
honest_dev.body:
Metadata: 35 chars.
Reality Check: Desktop has interactivity; Mobile is a glorified screenshot. I ran out of caffeine before I could fix the touch events.

classic_scapegoat.title: [DONE] Link copied
classic_scapegoat.body:
Size: 35 bytes.
Status: Interactive on Desktop. Mobile is 'View-only' as per the PM’s questionable requirements. Don't @ me.

works_on_my_machine.title: [SUCCESS] Deployed
works_on_my_machine.body:
Length: 35.
Environment: It’s interactive on my 27-inch monitor, so it’s your problem now. Mobile users get the 'Minimalist' (read: broken) experience.

stack_overflow.title: [INFO] Copied!
stack_overflow.body:
Payload: 35 chars of code I found on Stack Overflow.
Device Logic: Desktop: Full Access. Mobile: Look but don't touch. My responsive design skills end at display: block.

resource_squeezer.title: [200 OK] Generated
resource_squeezer.body:
Weight: 35 chars.
Warning: Full interactive mode requires a real GPU. Your phone's CPU can't handle my unoptimized JS, so it's read-only.

passive_aggressive.title: [SUCCESS] Oh look...
passive_aggressive.body:
Stats: 35 characters.
Support: Interactive on Desktop. Mobile is static, because apparently, making things work on touchscreens is 'too much to ask.'

legacy_code.title: [READY] Link copied
legacy_code.body:
Count: 35 chars. (Please don't refresh).
Legacy Support: Desktop allows interaction. Mobile is view-only to prevent the entire backend from collapsing.

cyberpunk.title: [SYSTEM] Uplink established
cyberpunk.body:
Bitrate: 35 chars.
Uptime: PC: High Agency. Mobile: Low Fidelity. Life is hard, and so is mobile optimization.

minimalist_lazy.title: [OK] Link's there
minimalist_lazy.body:
35 chars.
Notice: PC version allows clicking things. Mobile version is a digital museum—you can only look. I don't do media queries on weekends.

humble_adapter.title: [SUCCESS] 强行塞入
humble_adapter.body:
链接搞定了，已经强行塞进剪贴板。
反馈：长度 35，多一个字节服务器都要抗议。
真相：PC端能点是因为我还没把 Bug 写进去，手机端只能看是因为我不想为难你的流量。

works_on_pc.title: [OK] 传送门开启
works_on_pc.body:
传送门已开启（已自动复制）。数据：35 字符。
兼容性：PC 端交互正常，手机端只能看。别问，问就是“在我电脑上是好的”。

pm_scapegoat.title: [DONE] 链接占领
pm_scapegoat.body:
链接已生成，剪贴板已占领。长度：35 字节。
由于 PM 没给预算，只有这么长。体验：PC 端全功能版，手机端“劝退版”（仅限观看）。

hardcore_disdain.title: [INFO] 链接就绪
hardcore_disdain.body:
统计：35 字符（刚好够填满你的好奇心）。
环境：电脑端允许你乱点，手机端建议保持安静，看一眼得了。

spaghetti_code.title: [WARN] 居然没崩
spaghetti_code.body:
链接生成成功，逻辑居然没崩。体积：35 个祖传字符。
逻辑：PC 端支持交互（实验性功能），手机端仅支持静止画面（为了世界的和平）。

metaphysical.title: [SUCCESS] 大师开光
metaphysical.body:
链接已生成并复制。备注：35 字符。此链接经过大师开光。
注意：电脑端能交互全靠运气，手机端不能点全靠底气。

ultra_minimalist.title: [OK] 拿走不谢
ultra_minimalist.body:
大小：35。已复制。
说明：屏幕大 (PC) 的随便玩，屏幕小 (手机) 的别瞎点。

client_is_god.title: [DONE] 尊贵适配
client_is_god.body:
您要的链接（35 字）已复制。差异：PC 端是尊贵的交互版，手机端是“阉割版”。
内心 OS：“手机端不能交互”这种需求，我也很难办啊。

self_deprecating.title: [SUCCESS] 无效挣扎
self_deprecating.body:
经过 0.001 秒的无效挣扎，链接已复制。计数：35 字符。
状态：PC 端尚有余力交互，手机端已进入植物人模式（仅限围观）。

total_destruction.title: [SYSTEM] 认命吧
total_destruction.body:
链接已生成，长度 35。
运行状态：电脑端可交互（大概吧）；手机端只能看（认命吧）。
提示：如果手机端点不动，那是特色，不是 Bug。
